solution_line_template: That means he gets {total_burrito_calories}/{cost_burritos}=<<{total_burrito_calories}/{cost_burritos}={burrito_calories_per_dollar}>>{burrito_calories_per_dollar} calories per dollar
So he gets {total_burger_calories}/{cost_burgers}=<<{total_burger_calories}/{cost_burgers}={burger_calories_per_dollar}>>{burger_calories_per_dollar} calories per dollar

So he gets {burger_calories_per_dollar}-{burrito_calories_per_dollar}=<<{burger_calories_per_dollar}-{burrito_calories_per_dollar}={calories_per_dollar_difference}>>{calories_per_dollar_difference} more calories per dollar from the burgers
